unnormalised: Hey Delhiites, breathing easy lately? Not so fast! Air quality across the NCR region is showing signs of dipping again, post Diwali. Remember that smog from last year? We don't want a repeat of that "Breathe" movie scenario!
normalised: Hey Delhiites, breathing easy lately? Not so fast! Air quality across the N C R region is showing signs of dipping again, post Diwali. Remember that smog from last year? We don't want a repeat of that "Breathe" movie scenario!

unnormalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) data indicates that PM2.5 levels have crept up past acceptable limits in several areas, including Anand Vihar and RK Puram. Experts at the Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology (IITM) are blaming a combination of factors – stubble burning in neighbouring states like Haryana and Punjab, coupled with slow wind speeds.
normalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (C P C B) data indicates that P M two point five levels have crept up past acceptable limits in several areas, including Anand Vihar and R K Puram. Experts at the Indian Institute of Tropical Meteorology (I I T M) are blaming a combination of factors – stubble burning in neighbouring states like Haryana and Punjab, coupled with slow wind speeds.

unnormalised: While the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) is in effect, authorities are urging citizens to minimize vehicle use and avoid burning waste. Think twice before taking that car out; maybe use the metro instead? Let’s all do our bit to keep our air clean, yaar! Rs. 5000 fine for burning garbage isn't worth it. Let's aim for cleaner skies this winter. Remember healthy lungs, happy life! The goal is to bring those AQI numbers down, folks!
normalised: While the Graded Response Action Plan (G R A P) is in effect, authorities are urging citizens to minimize vehicle use and avoid burning waste. Think twice before taking that car out; maybe use the metro instead? Let’s all do our bit to keep our air clean, yaar! Rupee five thousand fine for burning garbage isn't worth it. Let's aim for cleaner skies this winter. Remember healthy lungs, happy life! The goal is to bring those A Q I numbers down, folks!
